translations.translation: They answered: "We have (in any case) to go back to our Lord.
They replied: 'We shall surely return to our Lord.
The magicians said, "We will certainly return to Our Lord.
They said, “We shall return to our Lord.”
They said: "Verily, we are returning to our Lord."
They said: Surely to our Lord shall we go back:
They said, 'Surely unto our Lord we are turning.
They said: Lo! We are about to return unto our Lord!
They replied, "We shall surely return to our Lord.
They said: verily unto our Lord we are turning.
They said, ‘Indeed we shall return to our Lord.
They said: "For us, We are but sent back unto our Lord:
They said: "Verily, we are returning to our Lord.
They replied: 'We shall surely turn to our Lord.
They said, “It is to our Lord that we will return.”
They said, "Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
[7:125] They said, ‘Surely to our Lord, after our death, however it come about, we shall be restored, we shall return, in the Hereafter.
(They) i.e. the wizards (said: Lo! We are about to return unto our Lord!)

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمع السحرة تهديده { قَالُوۤاْ } حين كوشفوا بمآل الأمر وشوهدوا بحقيقة الحال، مستطيبين مستنشطين فرحين: { إِنَّآ } بعد خلاصنا من ربقة ناسوتنا وسلسلة إمكاننا { إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا } حسب حصة لاهوتنا وحظ وجوبنا { مُنقَلِبُونَ } [الأعراف: 125] صائرون، راجعون رجوع الظل إلى ذي الظل
